name: Hatanpää Park
description: A verdant urban park offering riverside walking trails and lush green spaces within a growing residential district.

name: Hatanpää Arboretum
description: A curated botanical garden showcasing diverse tree species and scenic lawns adjacent to historic manor grounds and housing areas.

name: Hatanpää Manor
description: A restored historic manor house anchoring verdant parklands and offering cultural events in a picturesque residential neighbourhood.

name: Café Hatanpää
description: A cozy café serving artisanal pastries and coffee overlooking lush gardens and providing a welcoming spot for local residents.

name: Restaurant Vinha
description: A modern restaurant featuring Nordic-inspired cuisine in a leafy setting near the park with views of historic estate grounds.

name: Hatanpää Children's Playground
description: A vibrant playground offering safe play structures and seating areas for families amidst green spaces in a residential zone.

name: Hatanpää Linja A
description: A convenient bus stop serving multiple routes with sheltered seating and digital timetables adjacent to local housing complexes.

name: Hatanpää Linja B
description: A busy bus stop located near residential blocks offering real-time schedule displays and covered benches for commuter comfort.

name: Hatanpää Parking Area
description: A spacious parking lot serving nearby park visitors and residents with marked bays and easy access to surrounding green areas.

name: Hatanpäänranta Apartments
description: A modern residential complex overlooking park landscapes and river views, blending urban living with proximity to historic manor grounds.
